<title level="1" right="Focus 5" pfs="Standard">
[Arcane Countermeasure](/Spells.aspx?ID=2116)
<actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=721" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=645" />
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=148" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 265 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Bloodline**
[Imperial](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=27)

<row gap="medium">

 

**Trigger** A creature within range that you can see Casts a Spell.

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 120 feet

**Target** the spell cast by the triggering creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You undermine the target spell, making it easier to defend against. You reduce the spell's rank by 1, and targets of the spell gain a +2 status bonus to any saving throws, skill checks, AC, or DC against it.

 You can't reduce the spell's rank below its minimum. For example, a 5th-rank [_howling blizzard_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1559) would remain 5th-rank, but a 5th-rank [_fireball_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1530) would become 4th-rank. Targets still gain all the other benefits, even if you don't reduce the spell's rank.
name: Arcane Countermeasure
